label: finalDestinationCountry
comment: The country of final destination, at header level, for this header trade delivery.
The country of final destination, at line level, for line trade delivery.
The final destination country for this supply chain consignment.

rangeIncludes.comment: The area of land that belongs to a nation together with its properties such as population, political organization, etc.

domainIncludes.comment: A separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.
Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a header level.
Shipping arrangements and movement of products and or services including despatch and delivery at a line level.
